titles.title: A bill to prohibit Federal funding of Planned Parenthood Federation of America.
A bill to prohibit Federal funding of Planned Parenthood Federation of America.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary: This bill prohibits the availability of federal funds to Planned Parenthood Federation of America or any of its affiliates.
